name: Samurai Showdown (Jangler99)
description:
Game made during Sensei Game Jam 2018

One hit, one kill; samurai style

Alternative movement: For those without numeric board - Black player can also attack with \ and Enter buttons.

Kuba Misztal - team leader (mentor), grafik UI 

Bartek Stanasiuk - programista, animator 

Michał Dunat - programista 

Marta Włóczyk - grafik 2D 

Kacper Szkodziński - designer
